Entries.Rainy_Night_Maru: 这种天气有很多事可做呢，是吧？#$e#我把房子周围修了修……一些小修补而已。
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#我可能是个与世隔绝的女孩，但你在我的身旁我就会很幸福。$h#$e#嗨， @。真高兴看到你。有你在我就安心了。$h

Entries.Bad_9: 不知道我是不是选错了……在我们相遇之前我和塞布瑞娜就是好朋友。也许她才是那个唯一……$s

Entries.spring_22: 我有时想邀请我姐姐共进晚餐，可是她不愿出门。
Entries.summer_20: 不知道我姐姐是否有勇气邀请阿比盖尔出去？

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: 你觉得塞布瑞娜会和阿比盖尔在一起吗？#$e#哈哈……我现在结婚了，所以我也想让其他人步入婚姻。
Entries.spring_12: 你对明天的节日感到兴奋吗？能再见到塞布瑞娜太棒啦。

Entries.Outdoor_3: 我不想因为结婚而变得柔弱。也许我该开始多吃点红辣椒，并锻炼身体？#$e#只是想想而已……$h
Entries.OneKid_0: 我还在努力适应当一名母亲。别担心，我会好好照顾%kid1的！只是……我还不太习惯。
Entries.winter_1: 今年冬天你有什么计划？我知道你在冬天过得相对轻松。
Entries.Good_3: 我不善言辞，但是能成为你的妻子我很幸福。和你结婚是我做过的最好决定。$l
Entries.spring_23: 噢……明天是花舞节，对吗？我们必须得去吗？#$e#我讨厌穿着可笑又紧绷的连衣裙。为什么刘易斯让我们这样做？$s

Entries.summer_Tue: 不知道之前有没有和你讲过，其实塞布瑞娜是我同母异父的姐姐。#$e#不过我们俩长相是完全不同啦。
Entries.summer_Tue4: 塞布瑞娜从来都不和我讲话。或许她是不喜欢我吧。#$e#挺让人难过的，我之前就一直想要个姐姐，但和她却生分得很。

Entries.Fri: 你遇见我的女儿塞布瑞娜了吗？她就住在楼下。#$e#她为人害羞，但是你对她好她一定会把你当朋友的。
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: 我想念小瑞娜……她以前总是被人误解，但是我相信她。
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#我在塞布瑞娜的房间里发现一个烟灰缸，散发着奇怪的味道。我该不该担心？#$e#有时候我很担心塞布瑞娜……她没有多少朋友，而且对自己的未来漠不关心……#$e#我一直想跟她聊聊，但是她总是不愿意对我敞开心扉。
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: 塞布瑞娜告诉我她正努力戒烟！我真为她感到骄傲。
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: 我觉得农场生活对小瑞娜来说很健康。

Entries.Wed6: 我跟塞布瑞娜认识很久了。她是个挺有趣的家伙。#$e#除了你们俩人，我在镇上没有其他的朋友了。

Entries.29/f Sebastian 2000/t 1200 2300/w rainy: rain/12 38/farmer 12 29 2 Sebastian 12 39 2/skippable/move farmer 0 7 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 400/speak Sebastian "@?"/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/speak Sebastian "嘿，没想到会在雨中遇见你。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "你看天边那些乌云……"/pause 2000/speak Sebastian "希望是奔我们而来的。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "我喜欢这种天气，所有人都消失不见……#$b#因为人一多我就感到紧张。$s"/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 400/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 400/speak Sebastian "不过跟你在一起我没有紧张的感觉。$7"/pause 2000/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "我们都成落汤鸡了……"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 39/animate Sebastian false false 300 37 38 39/pause 300/playSound cast/pause 280/specificTemporarySprite umbrella/pause 800/speak Sebastian "来……这里有足够两人的位置。$7"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3500/end
Entries.733330/f Sam 750/w sunny/t 700 1500/z wi: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 40 9 2 Sam 41 18 2 Vincent 43 22 2/skippable/animate Vincent false true 500 18 19/specificTemporarySprite beachStuff/viewport 42 19 true/move farmer 0 9 1/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "嗨， @。天气不错吧？"/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/speak Sam "我只是来看看我弟弟。这种天气带他出来玩玩挺不错的。"/pause 1700/speak Sam "我们父亲也常常在风和日丽时带我们去沙滩玩。$h"/jump Vincent/stopAnimation Vincent/showFrame Vincent 0/pause 1000/move Vincent 0 -4 3/move Vincent -1 0 3/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection farmer 1/playMusic desolate/speak Vincent "萨姆……？$u"/pause 900/speak Vincent "父亲还会回来吗？$s"/emote Sam 28/showFrame Sam 34/pause 800/speak Sam "那是当然的，文森特。父亲一做好他的事就会尽快赶回来的。$7"/pause 600/speak Vincent "但是我听到很多大人说……我们的部队被打得落花流水。$s"/showFrame Sam 35/pause 1500/speak Sam "不要相信谣言。$8"/showFrame Sam 4/speak Sam "你忘了父亲有多强大吗？他才不会让垃圾戈特洛士兵抓到！你别担心！$a#$b#而且别忘了还有妈妈和我在这里陪你玩。"/playMusic ocean/speak Vincent "好的！!"/jump Vincent/pause 1000/move Vincent 1 0 2/showFrame Sam 4 true/faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Vincent 0 4 2/animate Vincent false true 500 18 19/playSound sandyStep/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Sam "老实说，我都不知道父亲会不会回来……新闻都播报了。我们的士兵伤亡惨重。$s#$b#但我又怎么能告诉文森特这些事呢？$7"/pause 1000/question null "#对小孩子坦白很重要。#你做得很对。不能让小孩子失去希望。"/emote Sam 40/pause 1000/splitSpeak Sam "你也是这样想的？$7#$b#或许你是对的……这是个残酷的世界，但是孩子们总得知道这个真相。$s~对……孩子们应该把握这个机会拥有一个快乐的童年。"/pause 700/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Sam "对了，我有告诉你乐队开始打出名堂了吗？#$b#对！阿比盖尔是个很棒的鼓手。而塞布瑞娜非常重视她……$h$h"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.384883/f Sebastian 1000/t 1100 1700: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 27 1 Sebastian 18 26 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianGarage/showFrame Sebastian 33/animate Sebastian false true 100 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36 36/positionOffset Sebastian 24 16/viewport 18 25 clamp true/move farmer 5 0 0/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 100/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 800/stopAnimation Sebastian/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 500/speak Sebastian "哦，你好啊@.$8"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak Sebastian "什么，你还没有见识过我的摩托车？唔……可能是我没有给你看过。$8"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 32/animate Sebastian false false 100 35 34 33 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/animate Sebastian false true 200 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/pause 800/playSound parry/pause 800/playSound clank/playMusic echos/pause 2000/glow 80 70 255 true/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "有时候，在太阳下山以后，我就会骑着它，开出星露谷好远……$8"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "顺着空旷的公路，向着城里微弱的灯光，一路狂飙，这个感觉无与伦比……$9"/pause 200/playSound clank/pause 500/playSound clank/pause 200/speak Sebastian "等我存够了钱，就要一个人出去闯荡……我要和我的摩托，去比城里还远的地方。就只有我和我的摩托车。$9"/pause 900/playSound clank/pause 900/stopAnimation Sebastian/playSound Milking/pause 1500/stopGlowing/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Sebastian "好了，油已经换过了。$8"/pause 1200/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 1900/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#嘿……如果你想骑的话，我或许可以让你骑一下。$8^嘿……或许我能找个时间带你兜兜风。$8#$r -1 10 event_garage1#听起来很有趣。#$r -1 -10 event_garage2#不用了，谢谢。我觉得不怎么样。#$r -1 0 event_garage3#我很怕摩托车。"/pause 900/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 4000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.384882/f Sebastian 2500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 18 35 0 Sebastian -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianOnBike/viewport 17 28/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@。我正要出发呢。#$b#上来……我想给你看样东西。"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 1 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianRide/ambientLight 0 0 0/specificTemporarySprite sebastianRide/viewport 15 8 true/pause 8000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianMountain/ambientLight 0 0 0/warp farmer 15 18/warp Sebastian 16 18/positionOffset farmer 0 16/playMusic spaceMusic/viewport 15 14 true/pause 10000/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "远处就是祖祖城……"/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "当我想要逃避一切的时候，就会来到这里，一个人……静静。"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 600/animate Sebastian false true 110 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 22 23 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1800/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#那么，你觉得怎么样？#$r -1 0 event_city1#好美啊。#$r -1 10 event_city2#这让我有一种莫名的伤感。#$r -1 -10 event_city3#有点儿丑。#$r -1 0 event_city4#你该戒烟了。"/stopAnimation Sebastian/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 3000/speak Sebastian "曾经，我对城里的生活很是着迷……但现在我觉得，在这山谷的老家里，我会更加快乐。"/pause 500/pause 900/speak Sebastian "@...?$s#$b#我很少带女孩子来这里……其实，你是唯一一个。$l^呃……我从来没对……女孩子有过这种感觉……但你与众不同。$l#$b#你知道我想说什么，对不对？$l"/pause 700/faceDirection farmer Entries.195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "For some reason, you decide to place your hand in your pocket..."/pause 500/message "You touch the rabbit's foot, and feel a sense of relief..."/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "Hey!"/textAboveHead Alex "What's up?"/textAboveHead Shane "Oh, hey"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "You showed up just in time for the first ever Pelican Town 8-ball tournament!"/pause 500/speak Elliott "Don't worry, I've never played before, either.$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "It's easy, you just gotta put some mustard on the cue ball...$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "You played a round of pool with everyone."/pause 1000/message "Sebastian won, of course... but it was still a lot of fun!"/pause 500/end

playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "出于某些原因，你决定把手放到口袋里"/pause 500/message "你摸着兔子的脚，感觉如释重负"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "嘿！!"/textAboveHead Alex "最近好吗？"/textAboveHead Shane "哦，你好"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "你来得正是时候，刚好赶上鹈鹕镇第一届八球锦标赛！"/pause 500/speak Elliott "别担心，我以前也没玩过。$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "很简单的，你只管猛击母球就对了…$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和伙伴们玩了一局桌球。"/pause 1000/message "毫无悬念，塞布瑞娜赢了...不过还是很有趣！"/pause 500/end

Entries.44/f Sam 500/p Sam: sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -32/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "啊，你好 @!塞布瑞娜和我正“玩音乐”呢。"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sam "我们想组建一支乐队，但是不知要搞哪种音乐才好。选择实在太多了。"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "#$q 76 null#说， @…… 你喜欢什么样的音乐？#$r 76 50 Event_band1#令人愉悦的流行乐。#$r 77 50 Event_band2#实验性质的硬摇滚。#$r 78 50 Event_band3#极富能量的舞曲。#$r 79 50 Event_band4#气氛活跃的乡村音乐。"/move Sam 0 2 1/speak Sam "你说怎么样，塞布瑞娜？我们就搞这个？"/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "……好。."/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/speak Sam "多谢帮助， @。有了我高超的吉他技术和塞布瑞娜的电子琴能力。我们一定会成功的！绝对会！$h"/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "只需要再找个打架子鼓的就好了……$u"/pause 500/end

Entries.2794460/f Sebastian 500/p Sebastian: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3 Robin -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Oh, hey. Gimme one sec."/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 1000/question fork1 "#She's busy... I should leave.#Stay put."/fork didntLeave/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Sebastian "Where are you going?$u"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "Sorry... I had to finish this line before I lost my train of thought."/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.sebastianRoom: resetVariable/move farmer 0 2 1/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 3 0 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#Ask her what she's working on.#Complement the decor in her room."/fork decor/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "I do freelance work as a programmer."/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "That was  an instant message from Sam... I guess he wants to hang out...#$b#Ugh, I don't really feel like going out today.$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "Oh, hi @."/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "Sabby, I know you don't like it when I come in here... but I ran into Abigail at the store and she said she was looking for you."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "Did you tell her I'm working?"/speak Robin "I did... but she said she'd probably stop by anyway."/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*sigh*... No one takes my job seriously.$u#$b#No one ever bothers Maru when she's working at the clinic... does everyone think I'm just surfing the web all day?"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#Ask her about her career goals.#Ask her why she doesn't want to see her friends."/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Well, I'm trying to save up so I can move out of here. Probably to the city or something."/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "You know, If I'd gone to college I'd probably be making six figures right now... but I just don't want to be part of that corporate rat race, you know?#$b#Well, and I guess I just feel more comfortable hidden behind the computer than dealing with people face-to-face.$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow."/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*sigh*... I like having friends, I just need a lot of time alone to balance out the social stuff.$s#$b#Sam's the opposite... he goes crazy if he's alone for too long.#$b#Maybe that's why I like computers so much... They're engaging, straightforward, and unselfish. Quite the opposite of a lot of people I know."/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow."/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.end: playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 9000/viewport 5 5 true/pause 800/showFrame Sebastian 29/speak Sebastian "Hey, not bad!$7#$b#It took me like, three or four tries to beat my first scenario.$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Thanks for stopping by... I'll see you later.$7"/emote Sebastian 60/pause 150/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "That was  an instant message from Sam... I guess she wants to hang out...#$b#Ugh, I don't really feel like going out today.$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "Oh, hi @."/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "Sebby, I know you don't like it when I come in here... but I ran into Abigail at the store and she said she was looking for you."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "Did you tell her I'm working?"/speak Robin "I did... but she said she'd probably stop by anyway."/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*sigh*... No one takes my job seriously.$u#$b#No one ever bothers Maru when she's working at the clinic... does everyone think I'm just surfing the web all day?"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#Ask him about his career goals.#Ask him why she doesn't want to see his friends."/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Well, I'm trying to save up so I can move out of here. Probably to the city or something."/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "You know, If I'd gone to college I'd probably be making six figures right now... but I just don't want to be part of that corporate rat race, you know?#$b#Well, and I guess I just feel more comfortable hidden behind the computer than dealing with people face-to-face.$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow."/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*sigh*... I like having friends, I just need a lot of time alone to balance out the social stuff.$s#$b#Sam's the opposite... she goes crazy if she's alone for too long.#$b#Maybe that's why I like computers so much... They're engaging, straightforward, and unselfish. Quite the opposite of a lot of people I know."/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow."/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.2794460/f Sebastian 500/p Sebastian: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3 Robin -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "哦，嗨。稍等一下。"/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 1000/question fork1 "#她很忙……我还是走吧。#待在原地。"/fork didntLeave/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Sebastian "你要去哪儿？$u"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "抱歉……我得在思路被打断之前，把这一行搞定。"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.sebastianRoom: resetVariable/move farmer 0 2 1/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 3 0 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#问问她刚刚在干什么。#称赞她房间的装饰。"/fork decor/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "我有时候会接一些编程的零活。"/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "是萨姆的短信……看来她是想找我出去玩……#$b#呃，我今天不太想出门。$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "啊，你好！@."/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "我知道你不想让我进来……但我今天遇到了阿比盖尔，她说她在找你。"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "你有没有和她说我在工作？"/speak Robin "说了……不过她说她可能还是要来。"/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*唉*……大家都不把我的工作当回事儿。$u#$b#玛鲁在诊所工作的时候就没人去打扰她……难道大家以为我整天就是在网上闲逛吗？"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#问问她的工作目标。#问问她为什么不想见到朋友。"/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯，我是想攒钱搬家。搬到城里什么的。"/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我要是上了大学，现在怎么也赚到六位数了……但我并不想进入企业，过什么勾心斗角的日子，你懂吧？#$b#看来，与其让我和人面对面相处，还是躲藏在屏幕后面要舒服得多啊。$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*唉*……我喜欢交朋友，但也需要许多时间来独处。$s#$b#萨姆则正好相反……一个人待太久，会让她发疯的。#$b#也许正是因为这个，我才如此喜欢电脑……电脑充满魅力，直截了当，又很无私。在我认识的人里面，没几个有这样的品格。"/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.Necromancer: pause 500/updateMinigame 6/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "萨尔斯：入侵者？你们竟敢闯入我的住所！"/pause 800/message "啊，原来你们是为了索拉里昂法杖而来……"/pause 800/message "嘿嘿嘿……真是愚蠢。你们很快就会加入我的骷髅大军！"/pause 500/fork choseWizard finalBossWizard/fork choseWarrior finalBossWarrior/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯射出暗影光线！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 800/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "你躲开了法术，但你的同伴却受了重伤！"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#治疗战士（萨姆）。#治疗法师（塞布瑞娜）。"/pause 500/fork healedSam/playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sebastian "非常感谢, @.$7"/speak Sam "...$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "塞布瑞娜放出“净化之箭”……一道白光径直击中了萨尔斯的脸。恐怖领主尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound debuffSpell/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，世界恢复了秩序！"/addMailReceived savedFriends/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWizard: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#对萨尔斯施放“净化光束”。#为同伴施放“护盾术”。"/fork castBeam/pause 800/playSound debuffHit/message "你给萨姆和塞布瑞娜加了“护盾术”。"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "萨尔斯射出数道黑暗能量。其中一道击中了塞布瑞娜，却被你的“护盾术”弹回，打中了他自己的脸！"/pause 800/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "萨尔斯被击败了，索拉里昂法杖散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.castBeam: pause 500/message "你还没来得及施展法术，萨尔斯就对你的同伴射出了一道暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "萨姆和塞布瑞娜被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 500/playSound yoba/pause 800/message "你的法术正中萨尔斯的面门。"/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/message "他尖叫着化为了灰烬。你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，秩序与和平重返人间."/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.chargeAhead: pause 500/message "你向前冲去，但萨尔斯却绕过了你，对你的同伴施放了暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "萨姆和塞布瑞娜被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 800/message "你再次挥起利剑，结结实实地击中了萨尔斯，他尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起。秩序与和平重返人间。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWarrior: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#挥舞着长剑冲上去。#用你的盾保护同伴。"/fork chargeAhead/pause 1200/message "萨尔斯对塞布瑞娜施放了“暗影箭”……但你及时举起了盾牌，弹开了攻击！"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/pause 400/playSound parry/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在萨尔斯准备再次施法的间隙，你挥着剑冲上去，了结了他"/playSound swordswipe/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "索拉里昂法杖在你高举的手中散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.end: playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 9000/viewport 5 5 true/pause 800/showFrame Sebastian 29/speak Sebastian "嘿，不错！$7#$b#我用了三四回才通过第一幕呢。$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "多谢拜访……回头见啦。$7"/emote Sebastian 60/pause 150/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.Sam_spouse: 塞布瑞娜还是老样子。你在节日里玩得开心吗？

Entries.Sam: 不知道它们有没有毒？#$e#有点后悔把塞布瑞娜推进水里了……$h

Entries.MapPage.cs.11095: 罗宾、德米特里厄斯、塞布瑞娜和玛鲁的家
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13324: 我感觉有些抑郁。也许{0}能让我精神振作起来。－塞布瑞娜
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13378:
感觉有些抑郁。也许{0}能让我振作起来。
     -塞布瑞娜

Entries.2: 这是萨姆的假日购物清单^^每个人的最爱^^塞布瑞娜：泪晶、生鱼片^潘妮：绿宝石、虞美人花^文森特：葡萄、蔓越莓糖果^妈妈：香酥鲈鱼、薄煎饼^爸爸：意式蕨菜炖饭、烤榛子^我：仙人掌果子、枫糖棒、披萨
